key.name: model-name
key.description: The name of the Ramalama model to use for inference

key.name: reasoning-enabled
key.description: Show step-by-step reasoning for supported models

key.name: panel-position
key.description: Position of the chat panel on screen

key.name: panel-width
key.description: Width of the chat panel in pixels

key.name: toggle-henzai
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to open/close the chat panel

key.name: rag-enabled
key.description: Enable Retrieval-Augmented Generation with local documents

key.name: rag-folder-path
key.description: Path to folder containing documents for RAG indexing

key.name: rag-format
key.description: Vector database format (qdrant, json, markdown, milvus)

key.name: rag-enable-ocr
key.description: Enable OCR for embedded images in PDFs (increases RAM usage)

key.name: rag-last-indexed
key.description: ISO timestamp of last successful indexing

key.name: rag-file-count
key.description: Number of files in the current RAG index

key.name: rag-mode
key.description: How RAG should use documents: augment (docs + knowledge), strict (docs only), hybrid (docs preferred)
